源代码

                @charset "utf-8";
/**
 * @module 常用方法
 * @description 清除行内级元素间间隙方案
 * @method clearspace
 * @version 3.0.3
 * @param {Length} $font-size 指定子元素字号，默认值：.14rem <3.0.3>
 * @example
 * .demo {
 *     @include clearspace;
 * }
 *
 * 

 *      1
 *      2
 *      3
 * 

 */
@mixin clearspace($font-size: .14rem) {
    font-size: 0;
    font-family: arial;
    > .item {
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: $font-size;
        font-family: map-get($base, font-family);
    }
}
